https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yLqtFeZfRPoUUzzro3ogCdobB6q.jpg An 18th century African prince is turned into a vampire while visiting Transylvania. Two centuries later, he rises from his coffin attacking various residents of Los Angeles and meets Tina, a woman who he believes is the reincarnation of his deceased wife. Blacula
